author: parithosh
content: Feels like something we can push to the next devnet though, even if it's a quick follow. Purely because acd discussion time + merge + implimenation + eest + verification tends to take a few days of lead time.

author: parithosh
content: <@508125616940515329> <@792822129019584562> which EthereumJS branch should I use? I've just kept one node on devnet-5 for ethjs

content: for that  `eip7840` is the branch but haven't tested it yet

author: g11tech

author: parithosh
content: sure, ethJS has few validators so they can just be offline till then
